name: PickZy Interactive
description:
PickZy Interactive (P) LTD is a global web and mobile application development company. We have more than 100 programmers & designers on-board. We specialize in diverse solutions including web 2.0 design & development, enterprise web applications, PHP, Java and .NET development, eCommerce solutions, CMS websites, iPhone/iPad apps, and BlackBerry apps.
Tailored to meet international standards and client expectations, our methodology ensures proper risk management, a seamless work flow, and deadline-oriented development. We have built-in processes to monitor stringent adherence to quality of service, consistency of performance and accomplishment of project milestones.
